#summary About Anyplex - on demand movies for the Olevia boxes

= Introduction =

*Anyplex* is a video-on-demand service in [HongKong Hong Kong] who allow download of movies via the internet to watch on TV.


= Details =

http://image.anyplex.com/homeimg.jpg

This opening display is hard-coded in the [Olevia] firmware version 2.1.1.

I have not heard of anyone in [NewZealand New Zealand] who has managed to use it from here. No doubt our internet would be far too slow!
